amendment.description: An amendment numbered 168 printed in House Report 115-702 to ensure competition in the commercial e-commerce portal procurement program to foster a marketplace that provides the best products at the best prices.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 168 printed in House Report 115-702 to ensure competition in the commercial e-commerce portal procurement program to foster a marketplace that provides the best products at the best prices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ferguson amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Ferguson.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ferguson amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
